channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: Now that B-troupe is officially going to the nationals, Cleo isn?t so sure they have earned it. Nick has concerns of his own, but an A-Troupe legend visits and shares that there is another, controversial, way to ensure the very best team represents the studio at the competition. As Cleo turns on her teammates, Richelle relies on hers after an upsetting run-in with a certain someone, and Ozzy speculates as to whether there is someone leaking private information about TNS.
